text: Paul Albert Zipfel (September 22, 1935 - July 14, 2019) was an American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. He was the sixth Bishop of Bismarck, North Dakota. Zipfel was born in St. Louis, Missouri. Zipfel died on July 14, 2019 in Normandy, Missouri from dementia at the age of 83.Bishop Zipfel passes away ==References== ==Other websites== *Diocese of Bismarck Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:Disease- related deaths in Missouri Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from St. Louis, Missouri Category:People from Bismarck, North Dakota
title: Paul Albert Zipfel
